title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction to environmental degradation, Water pollution: different pollutants, BOD and its modelling, Rock drainage. Groundwater: characteristics, pollution, modelling; water treatment technologies: active and passive remediation techniques; Degraded Soil: characteristics, conditions for plant growth, influence of different parameters. Revegetation. Soil erosion: types, estimation and control. Soil erosion control methods .Air pollution: effects, Gaseous pollutants and dust, classification. Effects of criteria pollutants on normal and COPD subjects. Air pollution Control, Noise pollution and control, Environmental Risk. EIA, EMP and environmental monitoring.
